title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 542.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 542.3 - Applicability

State Regulations

This regulation applies to all facilities operated or
licensed by the Office of Mental Health and to all individuals authorized
pursuant to this Part to possess firearms and ammunition at such a
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
542.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
